_A.description: Library ABIE XML namespace string (for ASBIEs)

DigitalAgreement.description: A document used to support business parties agreeing on a set of digital processes, terms and conditions to ensure interoperability.

DigitalAgreement.title: Digital Agreement. Details
DigitalAgreement.description: A document used to support business parties agreeing on a set of digital processes, terms and conditions to ensure interoperability.

UBLExtensions.title: UBLExtensions
UBLExtensions.description: An optional set of extensions to the committee model

UBLVersionID.title: Digital Agreement. UBL Version Identifier. Identifier
UBLVersionID.description: Identifies the earliest version of the UBL 2 schema for this document type that defines all of the elements that might be encountered in the current instance.

CustomizationID.title: Digital Agreement. Customization Identifier. Identifier
CustomizationID.description: Identifies a user-defined customization of UBL for a specific use.

ProfileID.title: Digital Agreement. Profile Identifier. Identifier
ProfileID.description: Identifies a user-defined profile of the customization of UBL being used.

ProfileExecutionID.title: Digital Agreement. Profile Execution Identifier. Identifier
ProfileExecutionID.description: Identifies an instance of executing a profile, to associate all transactions in a collaboration.

ID.title: Digital Agreement. Identifier
ID.description: An identifier for this document, assigned by the sender.

UUID.title: Digital Agreement. UUID. Identifier
UUID.description: A universally unique identifier for an instance of this document.

IssueDate.title: Digital Agreement. Issue Date. Date
IssueDate.description: The date, assigned by the sender, on which this document was issued.

IssueTime.title: Digital Agreement. Issue Time. Time
IssueTime.description: The time, assigned by the sender, at which this document was issued.

AgreementTypeCode.title: Digital Agreement. Agreement Type Code. Code
AgreementTypeCode.description: A code signifying the type of digital agreement (e.g. bi-lateral, multi-lateral).

VersionID.title: Digital Agreement. Version Identifier. Identifier
VersionID.description: Identifies the current version of this digital agreement.

PreviousVersionID.title: Digital Agreement. Previous Version Identifier. Identifier
PreviousVersionID.description: Identifies the previous version of this digital agreement.

RequiredResponseMessageLevelCode.title: Digital Agreement. Required_ Response Message Level Code. Code
RequiredResponseMessageLevelCode.description: A code signifying the minimum response message level the parties are required to provide (e.g. EESPA response message level).

Signature.title: Digital Agreement. Signature
Signature.description: A signature applied to this document.

GovernorParty.title: Digital Agreement. Governor_ Party. Party
GovernorParty.description: The party governing the agreement (e.g. a multi-lateral digital agreement).

ParticipantParty.title: Digital Agreement. Participant Party
ParticipantParty.description: The business parties agreeing on a set of digital processes, terms and conditions to ensure interoperability.

AgreementCountry.title: Digital Agreement. Agreement_ Country. Country
AgreementCountry.description: The country to which this digital agreement applies.

RequiredCertificationDocumentReference.title: Digital Agreement. Required Certification_ Document Reference. Document Reference
RequiredCertificationDocumentReference.description: A reference to a certification document required by this digital agreement.

DigitalAgreementTerms.title: Digital Agreement. Digital Agreement Terms
DigitalAgreementTerms.description: A reference to digital agreement terms and conditions.

DigitalProcess.title: Digital Agreement. Digital Process
DigitalProcess.description: The digital processes in scope of this digital agreement.
